quizChooses.title: Answer the following
quizChooses.qtitle: Compare between each of the following according to their functions

questions.paragraph: Golgi apparatus, and the endoplasmic reticulum
popup: Golgi apparatus: Packaging and preparing materials inside the cell and transporting them outside.
Endoplasmic reticulum: Helps in the transport of proteins inside the cell.
Cell wall: Protects the plant cell and gives it a specific shape.
Cell membrane: Controls the entry of substances into and out of the cell.
The nucleus: Controls the activities of the cell and its division.
Mitochondria: Energy production in the cell.

questions.paragraph: The cell membrane is characterized by the property of selective permeability. Explain.
popup: This means that it controls the passage of certain substances and molecules between the inside and outside of the cell.

questions.paragraph: What happens if an animal cell contains green plastids?
popup: It can perform photosynthesis and produce its own food.

questions.paragraph: What is the organelle that helps the cell obtain its energy? Explain your answer.
popup: Mitochondria; as they assist in the cellular respiration process by utilizing oxygen to obtain chemical energy from food.

questions.paragraph: Living organisms vary in terms of the number of cells. Give an example of a unicellular organism, and another of a multicellular organism.
popup: A unicellular organism (Bacteria) -  A multicellular organism (Human)

questions.paragraph: The mail carrier transfers and delivers letters. In your opinion, what is the organelle that performs a similar function to a mail carrier inside the cell?
What is the function of the microscope?
popup: Examining and observing minute things, such as cells.
